structure.unit: Fires, Fire Departments And Fire Districts

law.text: The registrars of voters of towns containing fire districts, or the prudential committee in districts composed of portions of two or more towns, shall, at least ten days before the annual fire district election, make correct alphabetical lists of all persons qualified to vote at such election; shall cause such lists to be posted in two or more public places in said district; and shall correct said lists in the same manner as they are required by law to correct voting lists for town elections.
